text.section: Hearings under this chapter shall be conducted in accordance with KRS Chapter 13B.

A final order may be withdrawn, set aside, or amended, if action is taken between the date of the rendition of the final order and the expiration of the time for appeal or until an appeal has been taken.

law.history: Amended 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 111, sec. 7, effective July 15, 1996; and ch. 318, sec. 79, effective July 15, 1996. -- Amended 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 452, sec. 7, effective July 14, 1992. -- Amended 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 357, sec. 7, effective July 13, 1984. -- Amended 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 374, sec. 9, effective July 15, 1982. -- Created 1966 Ky. Acts ch. 175, secs. 14 and 15.

metadata.lrc-note: (7/15/96). This section was amended by 1996 Ky. Acts chs. 111 and 318 which are in conflict. Under KRS 446.250, Acts ch. 318, which was last enacted by the General Assembly, prevails.
